summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Smart Home Dashboard. All major functionality working correctly with 100% backend API success rate and excellent frontend performance. Mobile-first responsive design working perfectly.

Room cards display temperature correctly for all rooms
Room cards show active device count accurately
Room card expansion/collapse functionality working smoothly
Device toggle switches update state correctly with API persistence
Device sliders (brightness, temperature, position) update values correctly
Backend API persists all device state changes successfully
Security system arm/disarm toggle works with proper state updates
Door lock toggle works correctly
Motion sensor indicator displays correctly
Energy monitor displays correct total daily (44.8 kWh) and weekly (313.6 kWh) usage
Recharts energy chart renders properly with gradient fill and data for all 5 rooms
Energy chart tooltip shows correct values on hover
Media control play/pause toggle works with proper state updates
Media volume slider updates correctly with API persistence
Theme toggle switches between dark and light mode on both desktop and mobile
Theme preference persists correctly
Mobile navigation menu opens/closes correctly with smooth animations
Desktop sidebar navigation scrolls to correct sections
Toast notifications appear for device updates with proper messaging
Responsive design works perfectly on mobile (390px) and desktop (1920px)
All data-testid attributes present and functional for testing
Redux state updates correctly for all actions across all components
All API endpoints return correct data structure with proper validation
